name: MarbleMaze
description:
This is a Marble Maze game made with Unity.

Try not to fall!

The game has 3 levels:

1. The Forest: The gate is in the middle of the trees! Hint: Ss there another route?

2. The Sea: Surf on the wave and get to the gate! Hint: Just focus on moving the ball! It's hard!

3. The Ice Lake: Be careful! There may be breaking ice! Hint: Watch the color of the ice. But you still need to control the ball carefully! If you know you gonna fall, try to control the inertia, so when it's reset, you don't fall again!

Use WASD to control the ball's movement. Press Space Key to reset the level.
